name: Sexy Sniper
description:
Sexy Sniper is a dynamic shooting game set in a ruined desert city. You have to carry out an operation to rescue the hot hostages and destroy all the terrorists. Use your sniper rifle and your incredible aim! Take a comfortable position, when shooting, take into account the distance to the target and the trajectory of the bullet. Feel like a real sniper and save all the sexy hostages!

Main Features


  • Realistic sniper rifle shooting
  • Time dilation. You see every hit you make
  • Atmospheric desert city
  • A variety of kill animations
  • Convenient and easy operation
  • Hot girls!
